p: Listening to your was like food or drink after a long hard March.
I am trying ot find your writings. The library is getting one book, the one you mentioned on T.V.
You must have earlier writings I am a bystic, and much interested in spiritual matters.
I know the real meaning of Mysticism, as I know you do.
I'd love to know more from one much wiser than I.
Life is lonely waiting to find spiritual relations - they are mostly among the young Hippies so called today, but who are really aware as you declared on T.V.!
I am in early sixties and became aware nearly 18 years ago, after much pondering.
I read the writings of Glenn Clark of MarAlester College in Minnesota.
I also read Everlyn Underhill_and Saint Theresa.
I read the religions, each one, before I turned to the Mystics.
If its possible to answer, tell me about your poems, where I can get them, and all your books. I recognize you as a great Soul. Your views on animal killing were also mine.
